TopicTitle: Request For KASA Artwork, All is Appreciated!

Articles.Content: Hello everyone! I am to make a new career mode profile in KSP and I will log the details here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123729-KASA-Career-%28Kerbal-Aeronautics-and-Space-Agency%29?p=1984607#post1984607](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123729-KASA-Career-%28Kerbal-Aeronautics-and-Space-Agency%29?p=1984607#post1984607), but I would very much like a piece of artwork to have for this new agency, known as KASA! If you are interested, please PM me, and I will tell you the details. I will be extremely grateful to whoever helps me, as I have no art experience whatsoever on the computer! Thank you!
